| --- |

Explanation:

The paragraph does not contain any explicit mention of chemicals or specific compounds. However, it does mention "LACNP" which is an abbreviation for "Lateral Corticospinal and Anterolateral Columns of the Pyramids," a neural pathway in the brain. Therefore, it is the only valid chemical entity in the paragraph.
